headline: Field Engineer at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary:
IT Specialist - Deployment Engineer
Clearance: TS
Cisco router and switch installation and upgrade experience
Upgrade site to Windows 10
Upgrade site to Office 365
Hyper-V
Windows Server
Deployment laptops and desktop worldwide
Project Management of new sites/offices
Mark cable drawings for voice and data drops.
Mark drawings for power drops.
Assess power outlet requirements for IT equipment

defaultPosition.description:
Stand-up new sites and upgrade network infrastructure nationwide and OCONUS sites overseas.
Work with contractors on cabling and LAN room layouts.  Conduct site surveys before deployments.
Prior experience in new site build out of network design for new sites.
defaultPosition.title: Field Engineer
